players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I am very suspicious of Charlie since Bob was found dead last night and Alice has said nothing yet. We need to discuss openly to find who the mafia is."
Charlie: "Alice is the mafia. I investigated her last night and found out for sure. We need to vote her out before she kills again."
Diana: "Alice has been silent and now Charlie accuses her. But Charlie could be trying to mislead us. We need proof before voting her out. Let's ask Charlie for more details about his investigation."
Charlie: "Alice is the mafia, I swear. I was the detective who investigated her last night and got the result directly. If we don’t vote her out now, she could kill again tonight."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
